CPM: 0.25$ (it may be higher based on houly dynamic CPM analysis)Unique IP Count: 1 / hour!Withdrawals: As soon as it goes (max 2-3 weeks),Â  FaucetPayLogin/register: just simply enter your FaucetPay e-mail addressSupported currency: USDTMinimum payout: 0.00000001 USDTCaptcha: hCaptchaNumber of pages to complete: 1Ads: yesPopups: yesLink lifetime period: 24 hours, then will be auto-removedI know this URL shortener has the lowest CPM at the moment, but it can hopefuly grow.This URL shortener could be suitable for faucets / PTC sites or other Micropayment websites.It has integrated adblock and popup-blocker checks, so it's also good to verify if your users are not using some adblockers/popup-blockers.User interface for publishers is as simple as it goes, but it has every data you need.Enjoy!
